title: Language Proficiency Enhancement Program Based on Online Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of job-related terminology
context.additional_context: In a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, strengthen language proficiency and problem-solving skills simultaneously through practical, experiential learning activities. Focus on task performance that recreates real-world scenarios for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize field-specific terminology with 80% accuracy in work-related simulation tasks.
Learners apply professional communication strategies while solving real-world work problems through collaborative tasks with peers.
Learners identify and propose at least three improvements to their language use patterns through reflective journaling and feedback after experiential learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
